input.sentences: touring the architecture of the city was a favorite of mine .
we were able to go at our own pace .
when you look at the details of the building you appreciate how much time it took .
the clocks still work after all these years .
i have always wondered how they got the stones to make a slight curve on the buildings .
output.sentences: Touring in foreign countries is a favorite thing of mine to do.
I love perusing places at my own pace, although it can be great and instructive to go with a guide too.
The time it had to have taken to create the detailing on this building, for example, makes it the kind of view I want to spend a lot of time at, without the distraction of a talking guide.
My husband has a thing for clocks, and we always try to include several in our touring trips.
The stones in this building had a slight patina, which I wondered about until a tour guide kindly explained to me, so they are useful.
